column2: # We call the SingleR() function to annotate each of our PBMCs with the main cell type labels from the Blueprint/ENCODE reference. This returns a DataFrame where each row corresponds to a cell in the test dataset and contains its label assignments.

The following objects are masked from ‘package:celldex’:

    BlueprintEncodeData, DatabaseImmuneCellExpressionData, HumanPrimaryCellAtlasData,
    ImmGenData, MonacoImmuneData, MouseRNAseqData, NovershternHematopoieticData
